transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan ji.

Executive: Haan, good afternoon sir, Vineet baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Aap customer kya hai?

Customer: Vineet ji kya haal hai?

Executive: Badhiya badhiya sir. Haan haan maine kiya tha.

Customer: Vineet ji main ye keh raha tha ki kal unse baat hui thi kya naam tha unka? Ujjwal the.

Executive: Ujjwal.

Customer: Ji. Ujjwal ji se jo hai ye baat hui thi ke hamare na photo use kar rakhe hain kuch vendors ne.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Ab dikkat pata hai kya ho rahi hai? Mere hi photo diye hue hain.

Customer: Lekin vendor mere kehne se hata nahi raha.

Executive: To koi nahi sir wo hum kar dete hain. Us pe koi trademark ya copyright koi aisi cheez ho taki main usko waise bhi hatwa dunga baat karke. Trademark to dekho maine apna liya maine apne trademark ko liya hua hai. Kahoge uska certificate bhej dunga.

Executive: Nahi photos ke liye aapko us photo pe ya to aap us pe koi watermark ho aisa.

Customer: Watermark to sir hamare lage hue hain na aap aap ye dekho na hamari registered firm kab ki hai. Hamara jo hai photo kab ke lage hue hain. Unke photo kab ke lage hue hain ye dekh lo na aap.

Executive: Nahi nahi main main main ye kehna chah raha hun matlab aapke paas photo jo aapne upload ki hui hai ya fir unhone jo upload ki hui hai us pe koi watermark laga hua hai?

Customer: Haan watermark laga hua hai.

Executive: Haan to agar unhone watermark aapka lagaya hua hai to wo hata denge hum log.

Customer: Unhone bhaiya unhone kya kaam kiya hua hai main bata raha hun unhone mere se mera vendor the.

Customer: Unhone mere se picture leke apna watermark laga ke use kar rahe hain. Ab maine koi 40000 ki dal rakhi hai unhone 45000 mein dal rakhi hai usse mujhe dikkat ho rahi hai na.

Customer: Mere paas lead nahi aa rahi.

Executive: Koi nahi wo main ek bar dekh leta hun aaj to waise bhi chutti hai.

Customer: Achcha dusri baat jo meri unse baat hui thi aapke jo hai juniors hain.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Wo maine jo wo yu keh rahe the ki sir aapko jo hai agar koi proof aisa agar hum mangenge to aap proof kar doge ye hamari photo hai. Main apni location ki photo dikha deta hun aapko. Sari meri location ki photo hai. Meri factory ki.

Executive: Koi bhi sir koi bhi documented aisa koi proof chahiye hoga.

Customer: Dekho aap bhi jante ho jo hai Vineet ji ki jo aise to hai bhi ki main 50 ke 50 pe jo hai copyright leke dikha dun. Na maine le rakha.

Executive: Sir jaise jaise aap mujhe keh rahe ho na waise hum bhi try karenge hata de. Hum hata denge kuch se hata denge kyuki wo aapki photos hai aapka watermark hoga. Hum logo uske account manager ko call kar denge aur wo hatwa denge lekin fir agar us seller ne dobara laga di.

Customer: Ab fir hum dobara hata denge to usko

Executive: Koi permanent solution hona chahiye. Permanent solution yahi hota hai ya to koi documented cheez ho hamare paas.

Customer: Koi baat nahi aap ek bar to hatwao.

Executive: Haan wahi sab aaj chutti hai. Kal aap ek to aap na Ujjwal ke number pe call karna jo Ujjwal aapke account manager hai.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Kabhi bhi aapko koi issue ho to aap Ujjwal ke number pe call karna ya to aapke paas mera number hai aapko karenge. Sir jiya sir ka number bhi hai aapke paas sabka number hai aapke paas to almost.

Customer: Chalo.

Executive: Theek hai kabhi bhi sir aapko koi issue ho to number pe call customer ke application chutti hai. Abhi kal wo to maine phone dekh liya nahi to aapka phone koi entertaining na kar pata kyuki Ujjwal bhi available nahi hai main bhi nahi aap mere number pe call kar dena pakka utha lega.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai na. Chaliye theek hai sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Vendor using customer's photos with their watermark.

- Customer not getting leads due to this.

- Wants a permanent solution to prevent misuse.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to remove the photos.

- Executive will contact the vendor's account manager.

- Suggested customer to call Ujjwal for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call Ujjwal tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- photos, watermark, vendor, leads, account manager, copyright
